content: I am having trouble running jupyter on Casper. Both jupyterhub.ucar.edu and ssh-tunneling do not appear to work for me. Is there a good way to know the status of Casper DAV access?
What problem are you running into with the hub? I was able to launch a server just now
It is working now! Is it just a matter of trying every 20 minutes? I was getting a "Failed to Launch Server" error earlier today.
Any else getting "site can't be reached" for https://jupyterhub.ucar.edu/dav ?
I keep getting kicked off my jupyterhub job on Casper ("Server Not Running" error). Is there any work around other than wait?
Have you tried ssh tunnel? (see topic under "jupyter")
I am having the same issue. I think is systemwide issue right now, however, not restricted to JHub. I can't get a session with execdav, for instance. SSH tunnels will be subject to the same issue.
